page.title: 16HOUSING
page.content: Because this is a rural area many people visit from {Newcastle.}Some stay in the numerous wooden chalets around this area.Several of these have permanent residents who form part of the local community but the majority come only for weekends and holidays. There are several chalets at {Overdene {Farm}all are well cared for and many have immaculate and well stocked gardens.It must be refreshing for city dwellers to be able get a breath of country air-to go for walks in the beautiful countryside,have a pint in the local pub,and know that children can safely play in the fields and nearby park.Other farms have caravan sites,both for static and travelling vans,one,{Spital Farm }regularly hosts a meet from the caravan club.Amenities are basic,but fresh farm eggs and lovely scenery make up for a lot.
